column4: A website says an applet is supposed to pop-up in another window, but it isn't working in firefox
but it doesn't show the pop-up blocker thing
do you see a lightbulb on the bottom right hand side of the window?
what version of Ubuntu and Firefox are you using?
I'm using ubuntu 7.10 gutsy, and firefox version 2.0.0.11
does the applet work fine otherwise?
could you post the link so I can try?
It's not working for me either. I suspect the applet isn't working properly.
I remember the applet used to work fine when I was running windows
so it's worked in windows but not in Ubuntu?
were you using firefox with windows?
I'm sorry, from all of the information I'm getting, it seems to be a problem with the way the applet is coded.
I would contact the developer to see if they have a solution.
For what it's worth, you're welcome.
